item.description:
As a licensed psychotherapist in private practice, http://www.jobstresss..., that treats this and other mental health conditions, I have witnessed how debilitating this condition can be. I also have witnessed how effective treatments that are available can make a HUGE difference; that's why ongoing critical research is needed. I have contacted the OCD Foundation http://www.ocfoundati... to obtain their support with advertising this event to make this the 1st annual OCD bike ride in Boston ever!

All pledges you obtain will go directly to the OCF to continue the critical ongoing research needed to help treat this condition.

Here is a link that you can provide to anyone who wants to make a pledge. Please have them state in the comments section that the donation is for the OCF Bike Fundraiser.....

https://www.givedirec...

I plan to run this event every year as the organizer and founder for this very important cause!

Please ride with me and join us for a fun day!

This year there will only be one ride with a length of about 26 miles. This is not a race but a ride so no one has to finish the ride if it is too long for them. Any part that you can complete is acceptable.

There will be no minimum to raise unlike some other fundraisers. Any amount raised will be appreciated!

If you would like to help as a volunteer, please contact me by e-mail at robfox@verizon.net

Rain Date will be Sunday September 14th.

Warm Regards,

Rob Fox

Please Note: Be sure to bring plenty of water and energy snacks. While we have permission to park at the Concord Middle School, we unfortunately won't have access to bathroom facilities etc....
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the sign with the big 300.3 with an X throught it!
item.name: 1st Annual Bike Ride and Fundraiser for (OCD) Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
